title: Sec 8 - 1 bedroom apartment Available!!
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


We have 1 Bedroom Apt's for rent! Move in Ready!!
At the time there is a One bedroom apartement in a walk up building located on St. lawrence ave in the bronx!
Close to Cross Bronx Expressway
One block away from Westchester ave 6 train!
Just 2 miles from Parchester shopping Center.

All you need to qualify is;
Annual Combined income of $67,000 if applying without Sec8
Credit score of 650 or more.
1month rent, 1 month Security
Sec 8 Welcomed! Sec8 Voucher and package (Nycha, Hpd, CVR and Ehv)

If interested and ready to see! Please email us with a detailed message stating your income and credit! Please make sure you read the requirements.
SERIOUS INQUIRY ONLY!!!!
